text: John Henley may refer to: *John Henley (priest) (1692–1756), English clergyman *John D. Henley (1781–1835), U.S. Navy officer **USS John D. Henley (DD-553) (1942–1970), American Fletcher-class destroyer *John T. Henley (1921–2012), American politician and pharmacist in North Carolina
title: John Henley
